overview: The winner of 2014 Rainbow Award for Best LGBT Visual Arts & Photography expounding upon the works of Whitman and Keats, A Thing of Beauty portrays the effortless chemistry and interaction between men. These short films by Cocky Boys owners Jake Jaxson and RJ Sebastian illustrate the beauty of the unabashed shared love that men possess for each other. A Thing of Beauty shows it all.
title: A Thing of Beauty
